manifest.name: react-autosuggest

scripts.start: mkdir -p demo/dist && npm run copy-static-files && node server
scripts.lint: eslint src test demo/src demo/standalone/app.js server.js webpack.*.js
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && babel src -d dist
scripts.demo-dist: rm -rf demo/dist && mkdir demo/dist && npm run copy-static-files && cross-env BABEL_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.gh-pages.config.js
scripts.standalone: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.standalone.config.js && webpack --config webpack.standalone-demo.config.js
scripts.prebuild: npm run prettier && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.build: npm run dist && npm run standalone
scripts.gh-pages-build: npm run prebuild && npm run demo-dist
scripts.prepublish: npm run dist && npm run standalone
